name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive experience in building high-performance applications, primarily utilizing **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Vue**. Expert in implementing server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) using **Nuxt**, alongside proficiency in crafting responsive and progressive web applications (PWAs) with **Service Workers** and **Fetch API**. Demonstrated skill in developing and executing unit tests to ensure application reliability and performance.

Strong understanding of **microfrontend** architectures and **design patterns**, alongside hands-on experience with **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration. Familiar with **Git**, **GitLab CI**, and **GitHub Actions** for effective CI/CD implementation.

Possessing hands-on expertise in backend technologies, including **Node.js** and **Express**, I also have experience in team collaboration and self-organization, contributing to agile projects. My passion lies in integrating new technologies and methodologies that drive efficiency and innovation, particularly within the healthcare and financial sectors.
